pageTitle: WFMU: Michael Shelley: Playlist from February 27, 2010

textAfterTable: Listener comments!   Sat. 2/27/10 11:16am Peter: Great Bangles track, Michael.Thanks. Gotta love those Rickenbackers. I remember seeing them at the Ritz when that album came out. Leonard Nimoy was there.   Sat. 2/27/10 11:19am david rose MS#Hit Club #86: Welcome back, Michael! Great start. Love that Joe South track.   Sat. 2/27/10 11:22am half-caf: no kids, you nailed it. fair trade audio coffee. might not make it out of the house without it.   Sat. 2/27/10 11:27am Parq: Ben & J's has turned out to be one of the most cynical corporate takeovers of a small food manufacturer ever. Glad Juni had a good time, but I agree with your advice.
